name: Erik Vlaar
occupation: art and humanities Researcher,also a part time athlete.
description: Ok I am Erik,41 from Amsterdam Holland,I have lived in London for about 4 years,am seperated with a 3 year old daughter,her name is felicia,I have a kind heart yes,beneath my hard exterior lol,cool though with a temper,not aggressive,I can get mean at times if cornered though most times its just me bluffing,I like a woman who is kind,warm,someone who will put up with my tantrums and make me smile,Most of all I want someone who will love my daughter,looking forward to meet that special person.
